BODY.TITLE: Quality
BODY.CONTENT:
The efficacy of acai powder depends greatly on its processing method. Research shows that **freeze-dried (lyophilized) acai** retains far more antioxidants than frozen, air-, or spray-dried versions.

Never buy powders that contain added sugars, natural or artificial flavors, or fillers; choose products grown without pesticides.

BODY.TITLE: Key Components
BODY.CONTENT:
### Nutrient Density & Composition:

- **Unusually high in healthy fats** and low in sugar compared to other fruits.
- Per 100 g frozen pulp: ~70 Calories, 5 g fat, 4 g carbohydrates, only 2 g sugar.
- Contains all **essential amino acids** (~7.6% of total weight).

CALL_TO_ACTION.TITLE: Discover More About Acai Powder
CALL_TO_ACTION.SUBTITLE: Learn how to incorporate acai into your daily routine
